snippet.title: The Invincible - Chronicles vol.1
snippet.description:
The Invincible is a first-person retro-futuristic sci-fi thriller.
Support the development, Wishlist on Steam now: 🚀 https://bit.ly/TheInvincible
Wishlist on GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/the_invincible
More storefronts coming soon.

See all new footage, as well as a glimpse into the world of Regis III, in our first “The Invincible Chronicles” video. 

The Invincible is coming in 2022 to PC and consoles.

Based on the iconic novel from Stanisław Lem of the same name, The Invincible is a first-person retro Sci-Fi adventure thriller set in an atompunk world.

Join our community:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/StarwardInd
Facebook https://www.facebook.com/StarwardIndustries/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/starwardindustries/

Visit https://www.invinciblethegame.com/ for more info.



#theinvincible #retrofuture #scifi #pcgame #consolegame #videogame
